parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: offerType
parameters.description: Offer Type, currently only virtualmachine type is supported.

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: Publisher identifier string of image being deployed.

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: Offer identifier string of image being deployed.

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: Plan identifier string of image being deployed.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

publisher.description: Publisher identifier string of image being deployed.

product.description: Offer identifier string of image being deployed.

plan.description: Plan identifier string of image being deployed.

licenseTextLink.description: Link to HTML with Microsoft and Publisher terms.

privacyPolicyLink.description: Link to the privacy policy of the publisher.

marketplaceTermsLink.description: Link to HTML with Azure Marketplace terms.

retrieveDatetime.description: Date and time in UTC of when the terms were accepted. This is empty if Accepted is false.

accepted.description: If any version of the terms have been accepted, otherwise false.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

schema.description: Terms properties for provided Publisher/Offer/Plan tuple

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering REST API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

schema.description: Result of the request to list MarketplaceOrdering operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Agreement, virtualmachine, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Get Agreement, Sign Agreement, Cancel Agreement etc.

value.description: List of Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering operations supported by the Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for the request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

parameters.name: publisherId
parameters.description: Publisher identifier string of image being deployed.

parameters.name: offerId
parameters.description: Offer identifier string of image being deployed.

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: Plan identifier string of image being deployed.

200.description: OK. The request was successfully processed and the terms were accepted.

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

id.description: A unique identifier of the agreement.

publisher.description: Publisher identifier string of image being deployed.

offer.description: Offer identifier string of image being deployed.

signDate.description: Date and time in UTC of when the terms were accepted. This is empty if state is cancelled.

cancelDate.description: Date and time in UTC of when the terms were cancelled. This is empty if state is active.

state.description: Whether the agreement is active or cancelled

schema.description: Terms properties for provided Publisher/Offer/Plan tuple

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Agreement, virtualmachine, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Get Agreement, Sign Agreement, Cancel Agreement etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list MarketplaceOrdering operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Agreement, virtualmachine, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Get Agreement, Sign Agreement, Cancel Agreement etc.

value.description: List of Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering operations supported by the Microsoft.MarketplaceOrdering resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.
